title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-user support, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for Ollama with conversation history and fuzzy-find model switcher.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tune, Docker compose stacks, GPU tweaks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat UI with OAuth, shareable conversation links, and plugin system (tools, web search).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS in 100 lines of Python.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP, SSE streaming, and native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for integration testing of LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: CLI tool to convert and import GPT4All models into Ollama’s Modelfile format automatically.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models inside workspaces.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query Ollama models to summarise notes or brainstorm inside vaults.
